about_the_game:
Start producing beer and wine in Farm Manager 2021 Brewing and Winemaking package. Get the fields ready for hops and grapevines, harvest the crops and prepare a perfect recipe to produce your own type of the most appreciated spirit in the world.

Package content:
  • New crops: 6 varieties of hops and 11 varieties of vines
  • 7 types of malt and the possibility to produce it in the mill
  • New combine harvester, specialized in harvesting grapes and hops
  • Two new production buildings – Craft Brewery and Winery
  • New storage building where you can age your wines – Wine Cellar
  • Two new scenarios that will test your brewing and winemaking skills
